page.title: 02Woolston/Weston
page.content: This square contains the older houses in Woolston and part of the Council Estate of Weston,separated by a valley left as a park called Mayfield Park. The Mayfield Estate used to belong to the Radstock Family. In the Woolston part there is a mixture of detatched and semis built at different times from about 1920.It is noticable,though,that scattered among these houses are newer houses built in the last 40 years the gaps caused by bombing during the war. Woolston Secondary Mixed school is also just in this area. The council estate has been built in the last 20 years around the parish Church of The Holy Trinity.Here there is a small shopping centre,a library,a doctors,a dentist and of course a couple of pubs and a chip shop.
